title: Storage quota met using `chrome.storage.sync`
description:
The quota is being met and throwing a runtime error in the console for background.html.

`chrome.storage.local`  should be used for the time being because it has a much higher capacity (quota). The only drawback is that it won't sync across chrome's now. That can be worried about later though.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Figure out licensing
description: If we want to release this as open source we need to choose an open source license and make sure we include copyright headers in each file if needed.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Add jsdoc support
description:
The source code javascript files should have proper jsdoc documentation, and a generator tool should be used to generate the documentation into a /docs folder.

http://usejsdoc.org/

title: Ability to change the labeling method
description:
Currently the title of the active tab is saved. However, it would be nice to be able to choose to see the base URL or some other, prettier way of viewing the labels.

For example:
New Issue . Troy Wolters / kufu . Gitlab
- vs. -
gitlab.com

The first one is how it currently works, but adding logic for the second option and some UI elements to switch between them would be good.

title: Add tests
description: There should be tests in place to check both the logic and the UI of the app.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Cleanup code formatting
description: The css, html, and js files should be formatted to follow a consistent style. They should also have good variable names and follow best practices. This issue should not change any functionality of Kufu.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Ability to select time period for pie chart
description: There should be a dropdown in the control panel box that allows the user to select different time periods to view in the pie chart.

title: Add empty pie chart UI
description: When there is no data to display for a selected period in the UI, there should be something pretty telling the user that there is no data to display.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Fix tracking logic
description:
Right now the tracking logic does not work as expected.

As a test case, set up the code so that it views the items for the **last hour**. The pie chart should not have items that sum up to more than 60 minutes. This isn't the case at the time of this issue's creation.

milestone.title: Chrome Store Release
milestone.description: The state at which we are happy to release Kufu on the chrome store.

title: Rearrange into proper folder structure
description:
Something like the following:

```
.
├── src            // Source code files (.js)
├── resources      // Images, etc.
├── libs           // Libraries
└── views          // Views (.html)
```

title: Choose and Set up Storage Method
description:
We need a way of storing the information.

It should be local and secure.
